title: Understanding Social Isolation
text: Social isolation often occurs when individuals feel disconnected from their social networks. This can happen after significant life changes, such as the loss of a loved one.

title: Effects of Social Isolation
text: Social isolation can lead to feelings of loneliness and alienation. It is important to recognize these feelings and seek support when needed.

hintAnswer: when social networks change after a loss. The bereaved may feel alienated or detached from their usual social groups due to the shared history and memories with the deceased
